DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate follow donepezil hydrochloride administration patient mild moderate Alzheimer 's Disease clinical practice : cognitive function , Functional Assessment Staging ( FAST ) score , adverse events/adverse drug reaction , patient background .
DOC.brief_title: Post-marketing Surveillance Long-term Administration Donepezil Hydrochloride -Investigation Clinical Condition Safety Patients With Alzheimer 's Disease-
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Patients diagnose Alzheimer 's Disease Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Disorders ( DSMIV ) . Patients diagnose mild moderate Alzheimer 's Disease , applicable FAST score 4 5 . Exclusion criterion : Patients history hypersensitivity component Aricept piperidine derivative . Patients register survey .
